desc_content.paragraph: Helps controlling the system device (halt, reboot) and monitoring it

desc_signature.desc_annotation: = 'Application that helps you to configure your system'

desc_content.paragraph: Backup Cleep configuration files on filesystem

field_body.paragraph: True if operation succeed, False otherwise

desc_content.paragraph: Return cpu usage for cleep process and system

field_body.paragraph: list of lines from log file

desc_content.paragraph: Return list of not renderable events

paragraph.paragraph: list of events to not render:

desc_content.paragraph: Install specified driver. If install succeed, device will reboot after a delay

list_item.paragraph: MissingParameter – if a parameter is missing
InvalidParameter – if driver was not found

desc_content.paragraph: Set debug on all core modules

field_body.paragraph: enable (bool) – True to enable crash report

list_item.paragraph: renderable (bool) – True to allow event rendering for renderer, False otherwise

desc_content.paragraph: Uninstall specified driver. If uninstall succeed, device will reboot after a delay.

list_item.paragraph: MissingParameter – if a parameter is missing
InvalidParameter – if driver was not found
CommandInfo – if driver is not installed

desc_content.paragraph: System.cleep.restart event This event is sent just before restart command is launched. It allows modules to perform something before.
System.device.halt event This event is sent just before halt command is launched. It allows modules to perform something before.
System.device.reboot event This event is sent just before reboot command is launched. It allows modules to perform something before.
System.driver.install event This event is sent just before restart command is launched. It allows modules to perform something before.
System.driver.uninstall event This event is sent just before restart command is launched. It allows modules to perform something before.

paragraph.paragraph: list of field+value or None if no value
